SHORT_DESCR.P: The East of England Ambulance Service NHS Trust wishes to create a framework of multiple supppliers across; Bedfordshire, Cambridgeshire, Essex, Hertfordshire, Norfolk and Suffolk to provide a taxi service for the conveyance of the following:
— non-emergency patients and patients escorts for routine and ad-hoc requirements,
— low acuity patients and patient escorts,

RENEWAL_DESCR.P: The duration of the framework will be 2 years with the Authority having the option to extend for 2 further periods of 12 months.
